name: No Trouble At All
description: Edward Larkin is attempting to perform experiments on the Horta with Ferengi support. Edward La Forge is appalled, but there may be no way to stop Larkin without going outside Starfleet regulations. Can you stop Larkin and save the Horta?
rules:
-- Unique Section 31, Klingon, and Borg Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Larkin, E. La Forge, Horta, or Exobiologists will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Larkin, E. La Forge, Horta, or Exobiology
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Fisher

screens.text: "I think we've all heard of the infamous Edward Larkin, the man who 'invented' the tribble? Starfleet wouldn't support his research, so he's gone to the Ferengi--and they've let him run wild."

"Larkin's now conducting experiments on the Horta. I'm an exozoologist, and I can tell you the Horta are no zoo animal--they are a sentient species. Larkin's actions are beyond the pale, and well beyond the Federation's ethics."

"However, as I told my son, I don't see a way to stop Larkin. The Ferengi aren't part of the Federation. Geordi has suggested we go through less... official channels, such as Section 31, or less... scrupulous allies, such as the Klingons or the Borg."

"We're living in a new era, Dad. This crisis doesn't allow us the luxury of going by the book all the time. Our friend here can stop Larkin and do it without bending the rules too much. Just trust them."
